;(function () {

    const $canvas = document.createElement('div')

    setInterval(() => {

        $snow.innerText = Config.snow[rand(0, Config.snow.length - 1)]

    }, Config.interval)

    function rand (from, to) {
        return from + Math.floor(Math.random() * (to - from + 1))

    function useStyle (dom, style) {
